definitions.definition: Someone, usually male, who uses (or has skill with) magic , mystic items, and magical and mystical practices.
examples: The wizard conjured up a large fireball .

definitions.definition: One who is especially skilled or unusually talented in a particular field .
examples: He was a financial wizard , capable of predicting the movements of the stock markets.

definitions.definition: A computer program or script used to simplify complex operations, often for an inexperienced user.
examples: Use the "Add Network Connection" wizard to connect to a network in a series of simple steps.

definitions.definition: One of the administrators of a multi-user dungeon .
A virgin over the age of 30 who does not socialize and thus cannot find a sexual partner.

main_definition: Someone, usually male, who uses (or has skill with) magic , mystic items, and magical and mystical practices.
secondary_definitions: One who is especially skilled or unusually talented in a particular field .
( computing ) A computer program or script used to simplify complex operations, often for an inexperienced user.
( Internet ) One of the administrators of a multi-user dungeon .
( obsolete ) A wise man ; a sage .
( incel slang , sometimes humorous ) A virgin over the age of 30 who does not socialize and thus cannot find a sexual partner.
